src:
Liverpool Sudah Mainkan 400 Laga Internasional, Bagaimana dengan Manchester United?
06 Nov 2019, 09:22 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Laga melawan KRC Genk akan masuk dalam catatan sejarah Liverpool. Bukan hanya karena diakhiri dengan kemenangan 2-1, laga tersebut juga menjadi laga ke-400 Liverpool di pentas internasional. Terbanyak di antara klub Inggris lain.
Laga Liverpool vs KRC Genk digelar pada Rabu (6/11/2019) dini hari WIB di Anfield. Liverpool menang dengan skor 2-1 pada matchday keempat fase grup Liga Champions 2019/2020.
Liverpool unggul cepat lewat gol Gini Wijnaldum. Namun, KRC Genk sempat menyamakan skor melalui gol Mbwana Samatta. The Reds memastikan raihan tiga poin usai Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain mencetak gol pada menit ke-53.
Hasil tersebut membuat Liverpool kini berada di puncak klasemen Grup E. Tim arahan Jurgen Klopp meraih sembilan poin, unggul satu poin dari Napoli yang berada di posisi kedua. Peluang Liverpool lolos ke babak 16 Besar sangat terbuka.
text:
Liverpool have played 400 international matches, what about Manchester United?
Nov 6, 2019, 09:22 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Game against KRC Genk will be included in Liverpool's historical record. Not only because it ended with a 2-1 victory, the match also became Liverpool's 400th match on the international stage. Most among other English clubs.
Liverpool vs KRC Genk match was held on Wednesday (11/06/2019) early morning hrs at Anfield. Liverpool won 2-1 on the fourth matchday of the 2019/2020 Champions League group phase.
Liverpool took the lead quickly through Gini Wijnaldum's goal. However, KRC Genk had evened the score through Mbwana Samatta's goal. The Reds ensure three points after Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain scored in the 53rd minute.
These results make Liverpool now at the top of Group E. Jurgen Klopp's landing team won nine points, one point ahead of Napoli who are second. Liverpool's chance of qualifying for the Round of 16 is very open.
